name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: A formal identifier that is used to identify this MeasureReport when it is represented in other formats or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance.

name: $addidentifier
desc: A formal identifier that is used to identify this MeasureReport when it is represented in other formats or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A formal identifier that is used to identify this MeasureReport when it is represented in other formats or referenced in a specification, model, design or an instance.

name: $status
desc: Returns: The MeasureReport status. No data will be available until the MeasureReport status is complete.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The MeasureReport status. No data will be available until the MeasureReport status is complete.

name: $::type
desc: Returns: The type of measure report. This may be an individual report, which provides the score for the measure for an individual member of the population; a subject-listing, which returns the list of members that meet the various criteria in the measure; a summary report, which returns a population count for each of the criteria in the measure; or a data-collection, which enables the MeasureReport to be used to exchange the data-of-interest for a quality measure.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The type of measure report. This may be an individual report, which provides the score for the measure for an individual member of the population; a subject-listing, which returns the list of members that meet the various criteria in the measure; a summar

name: $measure
desc: Returns: A reference to the Measure that was calculated to produce this report.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A reference to the Measure that was calculated to produce this report.

name: $subject
desc: Returns: Optional subject identifying the individual or individuals the report is for.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Optional subject identifying the individual or individuals the report is for.

name: $date
desc: Returns: The date this measure report was generated.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The date this measure report was generated.

name: $reporter
desc: Returns: The individual, location, or organization that is reporting the data.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The individual, location, or organization that is reporting the data.

name: $period
desc: Returns: The reporting period for which the report was calculated.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The reporting period for which the report was calculated.

name: $improvementNotation
desc: Returns: Whether improvement in the measure is noted by an increase or decrease in the measure score.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Whether improvement in the measure is noted by an increase or decrease in the measure score.

name: $group
desc: Returns: The results of the calculation, one for each population group in the measure.

name: $addgroup
desc: The results of the calculation, one for each population group in the measure.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The results of the calculation, one for each population group in the measure.

name: $evaluatedResource
desc: Returns: A reference to a Bundle containing the Resources that were used in the calculation of this measure.

name: $addevaluatedResource
desc: A reference to a Bundle containing the Resources that were used in the calculation of this measure.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A reference to a Bundle containing the Resources that were used in the calculation of this measure.
